Soon she comes back with a pack of smaller diapers which used to belong to Adam but were now too small for him. ''I think these will be just the right size'' she says as she grabs your ankles, lifts up your bum and slides the diaper under you and closes the tapes.

''Aww aren't you a cute little guy'' she coos and carries you to the kitchen where she sticks a baby bottle to your mouth. ''Ok sweetie, finish your bottle and then you can play with Emily and Adam.'' You gulp down the milk while sitting on her lap, it really feels safe and comfortable. After you're done she carries you out of the kitchen and puts you into the playpen with your siblings.
